1: Praise ye Jah. Praise ye God in his holy place: praise him in the firmament of his power.
2: Praise ye him in his powers: praise him according to the multitude of his greatness.
3: Praise ye him with the clangor of the trumpet: praise him with the lyre and the harp.
4: Praise him with the drum and the dance: praise ye him with strings and the pipe.
5: Praise ye him with ringing instruments of hearing: praise him with ringing instruments of loud noise.
6: All breath shall praise Jah. Praise ye Jah.
